reviews.review_msg: She is pretty nice. But her tests are so messed up, she loves memorizing. She made us memorize the periodic table. I wouldnt recommend her.

The course is overall okay, but the labs are somewhat challenging. Additionally, Prof. Sharma's feedback and overall teaching style can be perceived as passive-aggressive at times. At other times, he sounds so done with us and acts like we are beneath him, not worth his time. Honestly, the TAs are better at teaching and giving feedback than he is.
Awesome at explaining everyday chemistry, as well as relating lab activities to real life senarios. He also has great knowledge in chemistry so goin to him for help is great.

Dr.Sharma is the best prof EVER!! He is sooooo hot and funny. I love this man. Definetly take courses with him if you get the chance, he is the best prof ever. His exams are extremely fair and he goes right from the text book!!!!
